Personal data (e.g., name, email address) is only collected if you provide it via the contact form. The data is used solely to process your inquiry.

The contact form uses the EmailJS service (United Kingdom). The privacy policy of EmailJS applies.

Your language and theme preferences are stored using localStorage.

You have the right to access, rectify, erase, and restrict the processing of your data as well as the right to data portability. You can contact me at any time.

6. Storage Duration
Your data is stored only as long as necessary to process your inquiry.

7. Disclosure to Third Parties
Your data will not be disclosed to third parties, except for processing your inquiry via EmailJS.

8. Right to Lodge a Complaint
You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

9. Cookies
This website does not use tracking cookies. Only technically necessary cookies/localStorage are used.
